Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl

This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeActivityParent Describes objects that can be a parent of an activity.
IAeAlarmReceiver Defines an onAlarm callback.
IAeAttachmentManager A generic attachment manager that provides a means of serializing and converting attachments formats.
IAeBpelObject Base interface for Bpel object implementations.
IAeBPWSFaultFactory Fault factory for BPEL4WS 1.1
IAeBusinessProcessEngineCallback Interface for the business processes call back into the engine .
IAeBusinessProcessEngineInternal Internal extensions to business process engine allows classes within the implemenation to use the engine while still hiding the implementor.
IAeBusinessProcessFactory Factory for creating business process instances
IAeBusinessProcessInternal Internal extensions to business process allows classes within the implemenation to use the process while still hiding the implementor.
IAeCompensatableActivity Interface mark an activity as compensatable.
IAeCoordinationManagerInternal Extension to the coordination manager implementation.
IAeDynamicScopeParent Interface for BPEL constructs that contain scopes that are created through the execution of an enclosing activity.
IAeEnginePartnerLinkStrategy Defines an interface for how a business process engine should manage partner links.
IAeExecutableBpelObject Interface for Executable Bpel object implementations.
IAeExecutableQueueItem Interface for items that can be executed by AeExecutableQueue.
IAeExecutionQueueEvent Defines execution queue events.
IAeExecutionQueueListener Defines interface for listening to AeExecutionQueue events.
IAeFaultFactory Interface for creating faults that get propagated to activities.
IAeFaultHandler An interface for fault handlers.
IAeFCTHandler Marker interface for Fault, Compensation, and Termination Handlers
IAeImplStateNames Tag and attributes names for XML serialization produced by AeProcessImplState and read by AeRestoreImplState.
IAeInvokeInternal Extension of the IAeInvoke.
IAeLink Interface for Bpel Link object implementations.
IAeLockManager A generic lock manager that provides a means of acquiring and releasing locks based on a unique resource name and hash value.
IAeLockManager.IAeLock Value returned from the acquire lock call.
IAeManager Defines the methods that a manager must implement.
IAeManagerVisitor Visitor interface for managers.
IAeMessageReceiver Defines a callback interface for objects that expect to receive messages.
IAeMessageValidator interface for message validation encapsulates whether or not empty parts are allowed
IAeProcessCoordination Interface that is responsible for handling coordination operations related to the process.
IAeProcessManager Defines the interface for process managers.
IAeProcessPlan Describes some basic characteristics of a process that we need in order to for the engine to dispatch a message to a specific process (or possibly create a process instance).
IAeProcessPurgedListener Defines interface for listeners that are notified when a process is purged by the process manager.
IAeQueueManager Defines the methods required to queue incoming data and activities that have executed and are awaiting data.
IAeReceiveHandler Interface for pluggable receive handlers to process receives from a partner.
IAeStateChangeDetail Contains additional information regarding an object's state change.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractAttachmentManager Abstract base class for attachment managers.
AeAbstractBpelObject Base class for BPEL objects.
AeAbstractLockManager A reentrant implementation of the lock manager interface that uses reference counts to determine when to free locks.
AeAbstractLockManager.AeLock This class implements a simple lock object which contains both a QName and correlation hash.
AeAbstractProcessManager Implements a simple in-memory process manager.
AeBaseFaultFactory Base class for the fault factories.
AeBaseProcessEvent A base class impl for process events.
AeBaseQueueManager An in-memory implementation of the queue manager.
AeBaseQueueManager.AeMessageReceiverComparator Comparator that brings the correlated message receivers with the most properties to the top so we can match against those first.
AeBPELMessageDataValidator Subclass of AeMessageDataValidator that validates the message iff the engine config has message validation enabled.
AeBpelState Models the state of a bpel object.
AeBPWSFaultFactory Fault factory for 1.1 faults.
AeBusinessProcess Describes the interface used for interacting with business processes
AeBusinessProcessEngine The class implementing the business process execution engine.
AeBusinessProcessEngine.AeDefaultPartnerLinkStrategy Implements a default "do nothing" strategy for managing partner links.
AeBusinessProcessPropertyIO Utility methods for serializing IAeBusinessProcessProperty to an AeFastElement and deserializing from the element back to the object.
AeDataConverter Utility class for converting between wsio data and our standard data container.
AeEndpointReference The implementation of endpoint references for invoking and allowing partner link invocations.
AeEngineAlert Impl of the engine alert interface
AeEngineEvent Implementation of bpel engine event.
AeEvent A base class for all AE Events.
AeExecutionQueue Used in conjunction with the process to ensure that we're only executing a single object at a time.
AeFaultFactory Factory for selecting the IAeFaultFactory by namespace
AeFileAttachmentManager This class implements a file-based attachment manager.
AeFileAttachmentManager.AeCounterMap Implements a map of from long keys to positive int counter values.
AeFileAttachmentManager.AeCounterMap.AeIntCounter Implements a simple counter that holds an int count field.
AeInMemoryLockManager This class implements a simple in-memory process def lock manager.
AeInMemoryProcessManager Implements a simple in-memory process manager.
AeInMemoryProcessManager.AeReverseComparator Implements a Comparator that reverses the natural order of Comparable objects.
AeManagerAdapter A base class for managers that don't want to have to implement all of the manager methods.
AeMessageDataDeserializer Constructs a message data object from serialized message data.
AeMessageDataSerializer Serializes a message data object to an AeFastElement or AeFastDocument.
AeNamespaceResolver Class used to resolve namespace prefixes for property aliases.
AePartnerLink The class implements partner interactions.
AePartnerLinkOpImplKey This class implements a partner link impl key.
AeProcessCoordinationStub Void implementation.
AeProcessEvent Implementation of bpel process events.
AeProcessImplState State saving object for Business Process implementation.
AeProcessInfoEvent Implementation of bpel process information events.
AeProcessSuspendResumeHandler Handles the suspensd/resume and process exception management logic for the business process.
AeServerProcessCoordination Handles the coordination related operations for a process.
AeSetVariableHandler This class is used to set the new value of a variable from user/console input.
AeSOAPMessageFactory Provides access to the global SOAP message factory.
AeStateChangeDetail Provides additional information regarding the object's state change.
AeSuspendReason Class used to indicate reason for a process being suspended.
AeUnmatchedReceive Umatched Receive collections object - which is a tuple for holding the unmatched AeInboundReceive and its assoicated IAeMessageAcknowledgeCallback.
AeVariable The class implementing all variable interactions.
AeVariableDeserializer Restores the state of a variable from a serialized variable document.
AeVariableSerializer Serializes a variable to an AeFastElement or AeFastDocument.
AeVariablesImpl impl for the variables object that contains a map of the variables and behavior for variable initialization
AeWSBPELFaultFactory Impl of the fault factory interface for WS-BPEL 2.0
 

Exception Summary
AeBpelException An exception which is created as a result of a BPEL execution failure.
AeConflictingReceiveException models a bpws:conflictingRequest
AeConflictingRequestException models a bpws:conflictingRequest
AeCorrelationViolationException models a bpws:correlationViolation
AeSelectionFailureException Standard BPEL fault thrown when there is an error selecting data for a copy operation or using a propertyAlias in selecting correlation data.
AeUninitializedVariableException Thrown when data is read from a variable that has not been initialized
AeUnmatchedRequestException A correlation violation resulting from an unmatched request.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl Description

This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities.
